name: GOT Dragon Rider (4x Upscale)
description: Transform your image into Game of Thrones cinematic dragon rider + fast 4x upscale (2 credits)

default_prompts.image_edit:
Use Image A as a high-fidelity facial reference for likeness and fine features (not strict identity lock). Generate a true photorealistic cinematic close-up of a warrior riding a massive dark fantasy dragon in flight. Dragon face touches the camera with only half visible in frame, roaring with fire glow, wet detailed scales, and natural imperfections. Rider leans forward on the neck saddle, smiling naturally with direct eye contact to camera.
Face realism priority:
preserve fine facial feature likeness and proportions
detailed eyes, lips, and smile anatomy
natural skin pores, micro-wrinkles, subtle asymmetry
realistic teeth and lip texture when smiling
accurate head scale vs shoulders
Seamless face‚Äìbody integration:
correct neck thickness and jaw transition
continuous skin tone face‚Üíneck‚Üíhands
physically correct lighting and shadow direction
matched exposure and color temperature
real contact shadows under chin and gear
unified depth of field and lens focus
no seams, halos, or cut-paste artifacts
Body and gear:
real leather/metal armor with wear and micro-scratches
anatomically correct posture and rein grip
natural wind in hair and clothing
Rendering constraints:
photographic realism only ‚Äî not stylized, not CGI, not illustration
real cinema lens look, shallow DOF
film color science, global illumination
no cartoon shading, no plastic skin
no blur, distortion, or AI artifacts
ultra-detailed, HDR, 8K, sharp focus
default_prompts.upscale: Ultra high-resolution photorealistic dragon rider, sharp focus, intricate details, cinematic quality, 8K, HDR

steps.name: upscale
steps.description: Fast 4x upscale with Stability AI (2 credits)
